<title level="1" right="Trait">[Grippli](/Traits.aspx?ID=264)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 86

Gripplis are a family of frog-like humanoids. Gripplis craft and use these weapons.
